artist: Designer: Frank Graham Holmes; Decorator: Schell Lewis; Manufacturer: Lenox
creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Judy and Kenneth Dayton and their support of architecture in the Twin Cities
description: small cup with an image of the Bull Pringle House, Charleston, opposite handle; porcelain saucer with luster trim
markings: \'L [with 2 leaf fronds]/LENOX/Architects\' Tea Set/1933/Copyright\', stamped in green, on bottom of cup and saucer; illegible number, stamped on bottom of cup
medium: porcelain, copper luster, sepia transfer decoration
title: Cup and saucer
